briefTitle: FAC Versus FAC Plus Weekly Paclitaxel as Adjuvant Treatment of Node Negative High Risk Breast Cancer Patients
officialTitle: Multicenter Randomized Phase III Trial to Compare 6 FAC Cycles vs 4 FAC Cycles Followed by 8 Weekly Paclitaxel Administrations, as Adjuvant Treatment for Node Negative Operable Breast Cancer Patients
summary: This is a prospective, open-label, randomized, phase III trial. Patients will be stratified after breast surgery, as per investigational site; menopausal status; node negative diagnosis, as per sentinel-node technique versus lymphadenectomy; hormone receptor status (positive versus negative).
